GSD.product_version: versions from v5.10 to before v6.1.12
GSD.description:
xfrm/compat: prevent potential spectre v1 gadget in xfrm_xlate32_attr()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v6.1.12 by commit 419674224390fca298020fc0751a20812f84b12d, it was introduced in version v5.10 by commit 5106f4a8acff480e244300bc5097c0ad7048c3a2. For more details please see the references link.
